name: José Ruperto Monagas
text: José Ruperto Monagas (1831 – 12 June 1880) was the president of Venezuela between 1869–1870. He was a son of José Tadeo Monagas.[1] José Ruperto Monagas was married to Esperanza Hernández,[citation needed] who served as First Lady of Venezuela from 1869–1870.[citation needed] Esperanza Hernández
